9/10
I want an expanded lore on this, or just any ntr with a childhood friends on it
Dispose your feelings fellow cunts

Good advice from Domagonic1  in the comments. Most women will have multiple men on hand for various purposes but I won't bore you with long-winded speeches. Out of 10 men she keeps in her life, she will give her heart to 1 man, and give her ass to the other 9. Don't be the 1.

Ya just like ovaloaf said this doesn't feel much like an ntr,this is basically a bad ntr, pretty sure ntr fans are disappointed and even I'm disappointed,not because it's a bad ntr but because it's just a mah dojin,I'm personally not a fan of this art style and body type (big boobs,hips and thighs) and as an ntr I didn't feel bad for mc or her bf since mc is dumb and their relationship didn't feel real enough for a ntr,over all 5/10
To quick .. P.E
Didnt feel like ntr at all when the mc is as faceless as the other guy. Also art felt lacking in  some parts, definitely some scenes artists could draw or had time to. 6/10
Great art but ntr really, switching between colors doesn't make it new, dark yellow to black to yellow, boo
What a waste of an artist.  Same ol same ol shit.
the story itself is pretty boring, but it's forgiven because of the art, 8/10 for the art
Not bad not bad
God I am just tired of this The mc's phone is coming while the girl is getting destroyed by the the ntr villain and actually enjoying it while their past memories montage their way through it trope
@pussylicker6969 thanks me too
not bad for being his first manga, I'm waiting to see how he can improve
At least the art is hot i suppose

If you read the afterwords, you could see that this artist only usually draw CG style on pixiv, and this is his first manga-style work. No wonder it's highly unrealistic. Looking forward for this guy progression.

been read to much NTR this getting cliché and old everything is pretty much the same was expecting a NTR where MC saw the heroine cucked him and MC decided to mount the NTR bastard at the ass from back and it become yaoi
The feels didn't hit enough
@LettuceZ lmao probably the funniest comment I ever read on here
I wanted an NTR where the wife/girlfriend got busted though

The title made this story seem interesting but the scenario was cliched. This NTR from the point of view of the heroine is boring, unless the artist's target audience are women with a rape and cheating fantasy.

@Alcomix make ntr realistic? the very basis of ntr is unrealistic, this doesn't happen in real life. All it matters is how much you are able to blend into the story. Some will hit you more, some will hit you none, but NOT A SINGLE ONE OF THEM IS GONNA BE "REALISTIC" you jackass

@sennoden. I keep reading it if something changes in the plot but it is still the same story but with different characters. and above that sometimes blackmail has no logic in some cases. I mean if you are gonna ntr someone at least make it realistic
hopefully the boyfriend finds out and instead of being a beta cuck, he wises up and leaves the girl
Remember, AWALT.
@Alcomix You call it a trash genre while claiming you read enough to come across all situations?? Why read it if you hate it that much?

Take note boys, this here is what's called a "dual mating strategy" that women employ. She apparently loves her childhood friend but will conceal this  separate relationship in which she gets her back blown out. He is likely to remain unaware of this and marry this garden tool, inevitably raising another mans child. Don't be like Sugawara here, take better precautions in life to avoid this fate.
It's neat how easily she takes it in stride

Uh, the plot was kinda, "thats it?".
Idk, art wise, you did good. Excellent, if u may.
Story wise, ik it's hard to fit decent character development into a 44 page doujin but atleast, not like this.
10/10 chara design

Wait she kept that shit on her bare LEG for years?! That shit would been mangled beyond belief. You expect me to believe from primary school to highschool that shit stayed lookin immaculate and not like that piece a shit blanket that nigga Greg Heffleys brother carried around?
Fuck all that story shit I'm just here for the art. I tried to read a ntr story just that shit was sad so you cant develop feelings for the characters if you dont know anything about them
This is good shit
You guys can't even find anything in this story, all of this need to change
oh... the plot and art is good~ ಠ﹏ಠ
Unlike you peons, I have ascended to a new realm of degeneracy and as such have evolved to only being here for the art. Can't feelsbadman if I can't read lol
Well, this manga isn't really that bad. I don't really like the NTR genre, but it's great
I was hoping we could keep up with the good stuff, but nah people just really want to double down with the absolute trash.
Nays nays we need more ntr
Good game everyone.. hahahahah
